about.description:
LAMMPS is a classical molecular dynamics simulation code designed to
run efficiently on parallel computers.  It was developed at Sandia
National Laboratories, a US Department of Energy facility, with
funding from the DOE.  It is an open-source code, distributed freely
under the terms of the GNU Public License (GPL).
about.summary: LAMMPS stands for Large-scale Atomic/Molecular Massively Parallel Simulator.

name: lammps

about.description:
LAMMPS is a classical molecular dynamics simulation code designed to
run efficiently on parallel computers.  It was developed at Sandia
National Laboratories, a US Department of Energy facility, with
funding from the DOE.  It is an open-source code, distributed freely
under the terms of the GNU Public License (GPL).
about.summary: LAMMPS stands for Large-scale Atomic/Molecular Massively Parallel Simulator.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set build = 2 %}
{% set name = "lammps" %}
{% set version = "patch_24Dec2020" %}
{% set sha256 = "9d4c3398b7bf96be2e5a6b4655d52f8d051b2ae57c5d15eb4caf2b4bec276827" %}
{% set date = datetime.datetime.strptime(version.split('_')[1], "%d%b%Y") %}
{% set conda_version = "{:%Y.%m.%d}".format(date) %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ conda_version }}

source:
  - fn: {{ name }}-{{ conda_version }}.tar.gz
    url: https://github.com/lammps/lammps/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
    sha256: {{ sha256 }}
    patches: 
      - macos_install.patch
      - vcsgc.patch
  - fn: vcsgc-lammps.tar.gz
    url: https://vcsgc-lammps.materialsmodeling.org/vcsgc-lammps.tgz
    sha256: f5b79f1bd72e226189ac4780503e3295e794d289dc2e1c8d3f948488ca995738
    folder: vcsgc-lammps
    
build:
  number: {{ build }}
  string: py{{ CONDA_PY }}h{{ PKG_HASH }}_{{ mpi }}_{{ build }} 
  skip: True  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - {{ compiler('fortran') }}
    - cmake
    - make
    - pkg-config
  
  host:
    - python
    - setuptools
    - {{ mpi }}
    - zlib
    - fftw
    - libpng
    - kim-api
    - libcurl
    - mpi4py

  run:
    - python
    - {{ mpi }}
    - kim-api

test:
  imports:
    - lammps
  commands: 
    - lmp_serial -help > help_serial.txt
    - mpiexec -n 1 lmp_mpi -help > help_mpi.txt  # [mpi == 'mpich']

about:
  home: http://lammps.sandia.gov
  license: GPL-2.0
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: '{{ environ["RECIPE_DIR"] }}/LICENSE'
  summary: 'LAMMPS stands for Large-scale Atomic/Molecular Massively Parallel Simulator.'

  description: |
    LAMMPS is a classical molecular dynamics simulation code designed to
    run efficiently on parallel computers.  It was developed at Sandia
    National Laboratories, a US Department of Energy facility, with
    funding from the DOE.  It is an open-source code, distributed freely
    under the terms of the GNU Public License (GPL).
  doc_url: http://lammps.sandia.gov/doc/Manual.html
  dev_url: https://github.com/lammps/lammps

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jan-janssen
    - ellio167
